attributes.comment:
I am writing to express my opposition to the increased USCIS fees.

There are many opinions regarding this matter. My own is coming from the
standpoint of an adoptive parent. I am currently a US citizen and am adopting a
child from China. The proposed fee increase would have a significant impact on
my adoption.

I can understand fees and even fee increases, however I believe the proposed
increases are a bit steep. Please take into consideration the time limits set on
these documents. Because of the wait with our current adoption and the short
expiration dates on the USCIS documents, we will have to pay the application and
fingerprint fees twice because the documents will expire. In addition, these
documents will require an updated homestudy which also adds additional costs.

Please know that this increase impacts not only persons immigrating to the US,
but also current US citizens. While many people may be opposed to international
adoption over adoption from foster care, that is not the issue here. The issue is
that I currently am a US citizen and am using my freedom to choose to grow my
family in the manner I feel is best.

Thank you for your careful consideration with this matter.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
